name: Family Guy Bertram Returns Changde "Bootleg"
description:
Bertram has returned from another dimension, to cause more destruction than ever. Stop him!

In Bertram Returns, you will travel 6 worlds and fight challenging bosses, until the final fight against Bertram's dinoborg.

Controls:

Up - Jump

Left/Right - Move

Down - Crouch

Space - Shoot

N/M - Level Select (Within Levels)

This game was hypothetically developed on a fictional 12-bit console made in China, that probably doesn't exist.
